**Opportunity Details**

* **Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):** N5865

**Tender Opportunity Description**

A Request for Information (RFI) is being issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) to gather information from suppliers on the requirement for:

* **Mountable Counter UAS Systems**

The required systems will be delivered to the Department of National Defence. The information will be used to determine the most suitable solution to meet the requirement.

**Submissions**

* Suppliers interested in providing information on this requirement should submit their responses to the designated contact information above.
* Submissions may be made in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments**

The RFI document is available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/23/695df7592a6d6a9c4a1c3cd97c559b3d/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29017.EBSU000.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/23/695df7592a6d6a9c4a1c3cd97c559b3d/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B
